sentences.en: Can you superimpose the two images?
sentences.cn: 你能把这两幅画重叠在一起 吗 ?

sentences.en: I did not see the number received, he superimpose number to me.
sentences.cn: 见我没领到号码, 他硬是把号码塞给了我.

sentences.en: I think you ought to superimpose the great trust of mine on your heart.
sentences.cn: 我想你应该牢记住我对你的重托.

sentences.en: The image of a seemingly tiny dancer was superimposed on the image of the table.
sentences.cn: 一个看似很小的舞蹈者的影像被叠加在了那张桌子的影像上。

sentences.en: To superimpose this life I was born into and grow out of.
sentences.cn: 我在生长出去;叠映的生活不能叠加其上.

sentences.en: You can superimpose the lettering directly onto one of your pictures.
sentences.cn: 你可以把这些文字直接叠印在你的一张照片上。

words.tran_cn: [地物] 叠加的；上叠的；重迭的；叠覆的，重叠的

trans.tran_en: to put one picture, image, or photograph on top of another so that both can be partly seen
to put one picture, image, or photograph on top of another so that both can be partly seen
